Light Town Korean BBQ.knownFor: “ Good Korean BBQ ” Reviewed October 3, 2013 Unassuming place but good BBQ. Usually hate ordering pork belly but their cut is meaty. Good idea to sit people who prefer similar meat at one table, especially picky kids. Helpful? Thank ElizabethY347 Report

reviewComments: With movies so expensive for a family to attend these cinema's are great at only $2 or $3 a ticket go ahead and bring Grandma too.
